reporter_caption.center: RUGGIERO v. PELLICCI, No. FST CV 04-4001485 S (Jul. 29, 2008)

court.center: Judicial District of Stamford-Norwalk at Stamford

unpublished.footnote_body: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.]

opinion_text.unpublished:
After hearing oral argument on July 28, 2008, the court reviewed the file contents regarding the determination of whether the Attorney Trial Referee's (ATR) Supplemental Report of June 9, 2008 and original report of March 20, 2008 are appropriate for acceptance by the Superior Court as a final order for judgment.
After the review of the respective parties' briefs and court orders regarding clarification of the ATR Report, and also considering the oral arguments of the parties, the court accepts the Reports and enters judgment accordingly.
CT Page 13434
